name: Flat-Icons
description:
The official Flat-Icons plugin with more than 27,900 icons. Why get this icon library?


✔ Access to hundreds of FREE icons without logging in


✔ User-friendly search – filter by name, style, and format


✔ 23 popular styles (full list here)


✔ ALL icons in PNG and SVG format (free ones included)


✔ New additions – we’re constantly expanding the collection


Want more options? Check out our Lifetime Bundle for unlimited possibilities.


Already own the bundle? Simply log in and access all your premium icons from the Figma plugin.


For support and/or questions, don’t hesitate to get in touch at: contact@flat-icons.com


P.S. We are pretty liberal with our icons but, in case you’d like to check, here’s our License Agreement.


About Us: Flat-Icons.com is a growing design team that delivers free and premium resources to fellow professionals. Instead of subscriptions that drain your cash every month, our goal is to give you something really valuable that you can use forever. Let’s make every design beautiful!
